ufw_enable.desc: Enable the firewall. Example: sudo ufw enable

ufw_disable.desc: Disable the firewall. Example: sudo ufw disable

ufw_status.desc: Show rules (basic). Example: sudo ufw status

ufw_status_verbose.desc: Show rules (detailed). Example: sudo ufw status verbose

ufw_reload.desc: Reload firewall rules. Example: sudo ufw reload

ufw_reset.desc: Reset all rules and disable UFW. Example: sudo ufw reset

ufw_deny_ssh.desc: Delete existing SSH allow rule and deny SSH access. Example: sudo ufw delete allow 22 && sudo ufw deny 22
ufw_deny_ssh.cmd: sudo ufw delete allow 22 && sudo ufw deny 22

ufw_allow_ssh.desc: Allow SSH (TCP). Example: sudo ufw allow 22

ufw_allow_https.desc: Allow HTTPS (TCP). Example: sudo ufw allow 443/tcp

ufw_allow_dns.desc: Allow DNS (UDP). Example: sudo ufw allow 53/udp

ufw_allow_from_ip.desc: Allow all from specific IP. Example: ufw_allow_from_ip from 192.168.1.10[Parameter:IP]

ufw_allow_subnet_ssh.desc: Allow SSH from subnet. Example: sudo ufw allow from 10.0.0.0/24 to any port 22
ufw_allow_subnet_ssh.cmd: sudo ufw allow from 10.0.0.0/24 to any port 22

ufw_allow_interface_http.desc: Allow HTTP only on eth0. Example: sudo ufw allow in on eth0 to any port 80
ufw_allow_interface_http.cmd: sudo ufw allow in on eth0 to any port 80

ufw_delete_rule_allow_ssh.desc: Delete specific rule. Example: sudo ufw delete allow 22

ufw_status_numbered.desc: List rules with numbers. Example: sudo ufw status numbered

ufw_delete_by_number.desc: Delete rule by number. Example: sudo ufw delete [Parameter:number]

ufw_deny_http.desc: Block HTTP. Example: sudo ufw deny 80

ufw_deny_ip.desc: Block all from specific IP. Example: ufw_deny_ip 192.168.1.0 [Parameter:IP]

ufw_logging_on.desc: Enable logging. Example: sudo ufw logging on

ufw_logging_off.desc: Disable logging. Example: sudo ufw logging off

ufw_logging_high.desc: Set log level. Example: sudo ufw logging high
